ABOUT ME

I’m a software developer with a background in XR development and digital arts, passionate about building interactive, user-focused experiences. My work blends creativity and code — from crafting immersive VR training simulations in Unity to building responsive web interfaces with HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

I'm also expanding into full-stack development with .NET Core and backend technologies, continuously learning to deepen my understanding of scalable, real-world systems. I enjoy the challenge of solving technical problems and creating solutions that are both functional and engaging.

Outside of development, I explore 3D modeling and digital drawing, I also enjoy watching series/cartoons and just going out with friends
